title: Bosch BE1259 Blue Disc Brake Pad Set - REAR
features: Advanced, platform specific Ceramic friction material formulation for optimal performance
Superior noise dampening provided by OE-style multi-layer shims
Slots and chamfers match OE design for quick and easy installation

Set includes pads for 1 axle (2 wheels) and synthetic lubricant for reduced resistance on sliding contact points; pads come wrapped in a protective blue shop towel within the box; hardware not included

REAR: Compatible with select vehicles (Note: vehicle trim level/engine may affect fitment - verify specific fitment details with fit checker above): FORD: 2007-10 Edge; LINCOLN: 2007-10 MKX; MAZDA: 2007-11 CX-7, 2007-15 CX-9
description: Bosch Blue Disc Brake Pads were created for the everyday driver, and benefit from the same robust testing and engineering processes as our premium braking line. Bosch Blue offers advanced, platform specific friction formulations (NAO-Ceramic and Semi-Metallic) for optimal performance. Blue delivers superior noise dampening capabilities with OE-style multi-layer shims. Rust inhibitive coating prevents the formation of rust and corrosion which can lead to pad degradation and noisy braking. OE design slots and chamfers deliver superior braking performance and efficient, quiet stops. Precision manufactured to strict tolerances for guaranteed fit, and simple, hassle-free installation. Supplied with synthetic lubricant for reduced resistance on sliding contact points. Set includes brake pads for 1 axle (2 wheels). NOTE: Pads come wrapped in a protective blue shop towel within the box. Hardware not included.
